Entries.{{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.2H:
LitD_Music.TravisHouse
                    /7 19
                    /TravisV 6 21 2 farmer 4 16 2
                        /beginSimultaneousCommand
                        /ignoreCollisions TravisV
                        /ignoreCollisions farmer
                        /addConversationTopic LitD_CT_TravisHouseHangout {{Event Cooldown Length}}
                    /endSimultaneousCommand
                    /skippable
                        /pause 200
                        /textAboveHead TravisV "Hm hm hm~"
                        /animate TravisV false true 175 24 25 26 27
                        /advancedMove farmer false 0 5 1 10
                        /waitForAllStationary
                        /emote TravisV 8
                    /switchEvent {{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.2H.Intro.{{Trav2HIntro}}

                    /end
Entries.{{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.2H.Intro.1:
resetVariable
                        /stopAnimation TravisV 0
                        /faceDirection TravisV 3
                        /emote TravisV 56 true
                        /jump TravisV
                        /pause 300
                    /speak TravisV "Aye! Now if it ain't my knight in shining armor.$l#$b#Come on in, come on in!$11"
                        /emote farmer 32 true
                        /advancedMove TravisV false 1 0 2 10
                        /pause 100
                        /advancedMove farmer false 2 0 1 10
                        /waitForAllStationary
                        /animate TravisV false true 175 24 25 26 27
                    /switchEvent {{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.2H.Outcome{{Trav2HOutcome}}
                    /end
Entries.{{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.2H.Intro.2:
resetVariable
                        /stopAnimation TravisV 0
                        /showFrame TravisV 35
                        /emote TravisV 16 true
                        /jump TravisV
                        /pause 1000
                        /showFrame TravisV 34
                        /pause 300
                    /speak TravisV "Ack! Is knocking on the door a lost art?$u#$b#Well I guess since you're already here, you can hang around.$5"
                        /pause 100
                        /advancedMove TravisV false 1 0 2 10
                        /waitForAllStationary
                        /showframe TravisV 34
                    /speak TravisV "Just stay over in the entry way, aye?$6"
                        /pause 200
                        /advancedMove farmer false 1 0 1 10
                        /waitForAllStationary
                        /pause 300
                        /faceDirection TravisV 3
                        /emote TravisV 40 true
                        /pause 1000
                        /showFrame TravisV 33
                        /pause 1500
                        /animate TravisV false true 175 24 25 26 27
                    /switchEvent {{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.2H.Outcome{{Trav2HOutcome}}
                    /end
Entries.{{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.2H.Outcome1:
resetVariable
                        /pause 200
                        /speak TravisV "Thanks for the help with those gulls!$h#$b#They sure one hardcore group of fellas.$6"
                        /emote TravisV 224
                        /pause 200
                        /emote farmer 56
                    /switchEvent {{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.2H.Cont
                    /end
Entries.{{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.2H.Outcome2:
resetVariable
                        /pause 200
                        /speak TravisV "Thanks for help with those gulls...$6#$b#I sure hope ya didn't tell anybody about that.$s"
                        /emote TravisV 28 true
                        /pause 200
                        /emote farmer 40
                    /switchEvent{{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.2H.Cont
                    /end
Entries.{{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.2H.Outcome3:
resetVariable
                        /pause 200
                        /speak TravisV "Oh yeah, sorry trying to join that seagull gang didn't work out.$6#$b#Ya seem like you're too good for 'em anyway.#h"
                        /emote TravisV 56 true
                        /pause 200
                        /emote farmer 32
                    /switchEvent {{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.2H.Cont
                    /end
Entries.{{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.2H.Outcome4:
resetVariable
                        /pause 200
                        /speak TravisV "Oh yeah, sorry trying to join that seagull gang didn't work out.$6#$b#I think they're missing out on a prime candidate.$h"
                        /emote TravisV 40 true
                        /pause 200
                        /emote farmer 12
                    /switchEvent {{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.2H.Cont
                    /end
Entries.{{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.2H.Outcome5:
resetVariable
                        /pause 200
                        /speak TravisV "Oh, and do I hope you're happy with yourself.$a#$b#Those seagulls threatened to poke out my eye if I didn't play for 'em all night!$14#$b#My fingers? Dead. Tired.$a"
                        /emote TravisV 12 true
                        /pause 200
                        /emote farmer 28
                    /switchEvent {{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.2H.Cont
                    /end
Entries.{{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.2H.Outcome6:
resetVariable
                        /pause 200
                        /speak TravisV "I can't believe you tried to grab one of them gulls...$6#$b#Glad to see you still got two eyes!$h"
                        /emote TravisV 224 true
                        /pause 200
                        /emote farmer 240
                    /switchEvent {{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.2H.Cont
                    /end
Entries.{{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.2H.Cont:
resetVariable
                        /pause 500
                        /textAboveHead TravisV "Hm hm hm~"
                        /pause 1500
                    /quickQuestion # What are you whipping up? # What's cookin' good lookin'? <
                        (break)pause 300
                            \speak TravisV "Blackberry Cobbler! I'm a sucker for this stuff.$13"
                        (break)pause 300
                            \emote TravisV 40
                            \speak TravisV "Heh. Seems like somebody's got a sweet tooth.$9#$b#It's blackberry cobbler if you'd like to know.$8"
                            \action IncrementStat LitD.TravisFlirt 1
                    /speak TravisV "I go pickin' berries every fall and bake with 'em year round.$h#$b#Good for the environment too. Most blackberries are actually invasive around these parts.$6"
                        /textAboveHead TravisV "Speaking of which..."
                        /advancedMove farmer false -1 0 1 10
                        /pause 100
                        /advancedMove TravisV false -1 0 4 10
                        /waitForAllStationary
                        /shake TravisV 500
                        /playSound dwop
                        /pause 500
                        /playSound furnace
                        /pause 1000
                    /speak TravisV "I've got a pretty peculiar companion.$6#$b#Let me show him to ya while this bakes."
                        /emote farmer 32
                        /advancedMove farmer false -1 0 0 1 4 10
                        /proceedPosition farmer
                        /advancedMove TravisV false -2 0 0 -3 4 10
                        /pause 1200
                        /advancedMove farmer false 0 -3 4 10
                        /globalFade 0.012
                        /viewport -1000 -1000
                        /waitForAllStationary
                        /warp TravisV 10 5
                        /warp farmer 11 5
                        /globalFadeToClear 0.012 true
                        /changeLocation 7thAxis.LitD_Maps.Jeremy_Room/
                        /viewport 11 21 clamp
                        /playMusic LitD_Music.JeremyTheme
                        /pause 800
                    /speak TravisV "ONWARDS TO CHAOS" 
                    /end
